title: Lenovo to design, manufacture, and export AI servers from India
description: LAS VEGAS, Jan 8: Global technology major Lenovo is planning to transform India into a key export hub for its infrastructure business, with plans to design and manufacture artificial intelligence (AI) servers in the country for global markets, a top company executive has said. Speaking to PTI on the sidelines of CES 2026, Scott Tease, VP and General Manager, Infrastructure Solutions Group at Lenovo, said the company will utilise its Bengaluru development lab to design AI server systems that will subsequently […]
content:

title: Hyundai unveils AI chips for robots at CES Foundry 2026
description: Hyundai Motor Group unveiled an on-device artificial intelligence chip as part of another major AI push, aiming to enable robots to perceive, decide and act autonomously in real-world environments, according to a report by Korea Herald.

title: 'Worst in Show' CES products include AI refrigerators, AI companions and AI doorbells
description: The promise of artificial intelligence was front and centre at this year's CES gadget show. But spicing up a simple machine like a refrigerator with unnecessary AI was also a surefire way to win the "Worst in Show".
content:
The promise of artificial intelligence was front and centre at this year's CES gadget show. But spicing up a simple machine like a refrigerator with unnecessary AI was also a surefire way to win the "Worst in Show”.

title: 'India Is Different': Ben Powell On Why India Is A Good Hedge To Artificial Intelligence For FPIs
description: As global markets rally on the back of AI fervour, BlackRock's Ben Powell defended India's position as a growth hub, calling it a different but unique story as foreign portfolio investors continue to remain cautious on domestic markets. In an interview with NDTV Profit, Powell explained why India, despite the absence of an AI-driven rally, stands out as a unique opportunity for FPIs to generate alpha.
content:

title: AI investment collapse could make US economy vulnerable: Jefferies
description: A sudden collapse in artificial intelligence (AI) investment could make the United States economy vulnerable, as AI-related capital expenditure has emerged as a key driver of economic growth in recent years, highlighted a report by Jefferies.

title: How to Use Gmail’s New AI Tools: Help Me Write, Smart Search, and AI Inbox
description: Google has announced one of the biggest updates in Gmail’s 22-year history, embedding artificial intelligence to make the world’s most popular email service smarter and more helpful. With over 3 billion users, Gmail is now evolving into something closer to a personal assistant.
content: Google is reshaping Gmail with artificial intelligence, marking one of the most significant changes since its launch more than two decades ago. With over three billion users worldwide, the update aims to transform email from a simple communication to... [1987 chars]

title: AI-Generated Court Submissions Drawing Increasingly More Severe Sanctions
description: Discusses the sanctions imposed in Billups v. Louisville Municipal School Distr., where an attorney cited faulty artificial intelligence (AI) output and violated Rule 11
content: The number of court orders and opinions being issued as to faulty or entirely hallucinated legal citations in submission seems to have reached a contagion level. In just a single year, we've gone from maybe one such case a month where we all circulat... [13744 chars]

title: Lenovo to build, export AI servers from India
